Comments_List: From this course? None whatsoever. It's hilarious to think that a completely undirected course would lead to you gaining knowledge or skills. As far as insights go, you gain an acute sense of the uselessness of this degree in whatever field you might be planning on entering.
Don't mix the final presentation with 495 people.
Don't apply for the BS/MS program. Just don't do it.
